channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: GitHubDaily /GitHubDaily | N/A | 40,381
item.description: 坚持分享 GitHub 上高质量、有趣实用的开源技术教程、开发者工具、编程网站、技术资讯。A list cool, interesting projects of GitHub.

item.title: Budibase /budibase | TypeScript | 26,244
item.description: Create business apps and automate workflows in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s, and more 🚀 No code / Low code platform..

item.title: microsoft /ai-agents-for-beginners | Jupyter Notebook | 35,087
item.description: 11 Lessons to Get Started Building AI Agents

item.title: Leantime /leantime | PHP | 7,288
item.description: Leantime is a goals focused project management system for non-project managers. Building with ADHD, Autism, and dyslexia in mind.

item.title: dream-num /univer | TypeScript | 10,549
item.description: Build AI-native spreadsheets. Univer is a full-stack framework for creating and editing spreadsheets on both web and server. With Univer MCP, Univer spreadsheet is driven directly through natural language.

item.title: RSSNext /Folo | TypeScript | 32,170
item.description: 🧡 Follow everything in one place

item.title: puckeditor /puck | TypeScript | 8,574
item.description: The visual editor for React

item.title: simstudioai /sim | TypeScript | 11,892
item.description: Sim is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to rapidly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

item.title: HunxByts /GhostTrack | Python | 4,136
item.description: Useful tool to track location or mobile number

item.title: TheAlgorithms /Java | Java | 62,876
item.description: All Algorithms implemented in Java

item.title: Klipper3d /klipper | C | 10,699
item.description: Klipper is a 3d-printer firmware

item.title: django /django | Python | 84,723
item.description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.

item.title: yt-dlp /yt-dlp | Python | 123,738
item.description: A feature-rich command-line audio/video downloader

item.title: midday-ai /midday | TypeScript | 11,279
item.description: Invoicing, Time tracking, File reconciliation, Storage, Financial Overview & your own Assistant made for Freelancers

item.title: plait-board /drawnix | TypeScript | 6,387
item.description: 开源白板工具（SaaS），一体化白板，包含思维导图、流程图、自由画等。All in one open-source whiteboard tool with mind, flowchart, freehand and etc.

item.title: EbookFoundation /free-programming-books | Python | 366,110
item.description: 📚 Freely available programming books

item.title: scottpetrovic /mesh2motion-app | TypeScript | 1,030
item.description: Import a 3D Model and automatically assign and export animations

item.title: HKUDS /DeepCode | Python | 2,407
item.description: "DeepCode: Open Agentic Coding (Paper2Code & Text2Web & Text2Backend)"

item.title: moeru-ai /airi | Vue | 9,324
item.description: 💖🧸 Self hosted, you owned Grok Companion, a container of souls of waifu, cyber livings to bring them into our worlds, wishing to achieve Neuro-sama's altitude. Capable of realtime voice chat, Minecraft, Factorio playing. Web / macOS / Windows supported.

item.title: winapps-org /winapps | Shell | 6,101
item.description: Run Windows apps such as Microsoft Office/Adobe in Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) and GNOME/KDE as if they were a part of the native OS, including Nautilus integration. Hard fork ofhttps://github.com/Fmstrat/winapps/
